detail_desc: Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped back pocket. Tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in an airy rib knit with a V-neck and button placket.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in an airy rib knit with a V-neck and button placket.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers. Long-sleeved sweatshirt with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Spotted bow tie in a jacquard weave with an adjustable fastening at the back. Width 6 cm.
Pre-tied bow tie in a jacquard weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.

Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Ribbed collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Ribbed collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
Calf-length skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high, elasticated waist with a small frill trim, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch jersey with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with frills down the sides.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy cotton weave with appliqués. Stand-up collar, detachable hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a single back vent. Quilted lining.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the back with lacing at the top. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and flared skirt. Unlined.

Multi-strand metal chain bracelet with wooden beads and marled plastic beads. Toggle clasp in brushed metal.

Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
